rules_text:
Search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
{8}{G}, Exile Influence of Kruphix from your graveyard: Return up to two target cards from your graveyard to your hand.
notes:
RDZ
Zoe Badini
alt https://www.artstation.com/artwork/ZePgNR
Search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle. (Cast this from hand or graveyard, then exile it.)
